chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
p: nat

Goal:
{a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l}}}}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => r div p /\ r div q /\ (forall k : nat, k div p -> k div q -> k div r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
is_lcm = fun p q r : nat => p div r /\ q div r /\ (forall k : nat, p div k -> q div k -> r div k) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_lcm (_ _ _)%nat_scope
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
bezout_rel_prime : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q}}
is_gcd_rel_prime : forall p q g : nat, is_gcd p q g -> exists a b : nat, p = a * g /\ q = b * g /\ is_gcd a b 1
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
is_gcd_lcm_mult : forall p q g l : nat, is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> p * q = g * l
is_gcd_mult_lcm : forall p q g l : nat, g <> 0 -> is_gcd p q g -> g * l = p * q -> is_lcm p q l
is_lcm_plus : forall p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + p) (l + u * p)
is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
is_lcm_minus : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - p) (l - u * p)
is_lcm_modulus : forall k p q g l u : nat, k * p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - k * p) (l - k * u * p)
division_by_even : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {j : nat | arem n d q j}}
arem = fun n d q j : nat => j <= d /\ (n = 2 * q * d + j \/ q <> 0 /\ n = 2 * q * d - j) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments arem (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
bezout_nc : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> exists a b : nat, a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q
Nat.Bezout = fun n m p : nat => exists a b : nat, a * n = p + b * m : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Bezout (_ _ _)%nat_scope
bezout_sc : forall p q a b m : nat, a * p + b * q = 1 + m -> p div m \/ q div m -> is_gcd p q 1
mult_is_one : forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\ q = 1
is_gcd_0 : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 0 -> p = 0 /\ q = 0
is_lcm_mult : forall p q l k : nat, is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm (k * p) (k * q) (k * l)
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [p : nat q : nat |- nat] ?n : [p : nat q : nat |- nat]
is_rel_prime_lcm : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> is_lcm p q (p * q)
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.testbit_spec : forall a n : nat, exists l h : nat, 0 <= l < 2 ^ n /\ a = l + (Nat.b2n (Nat.testbit a n) + 2 * h) * 2 ^ n
is_gcd_mult : forall p q r n : nat, is_gcd p (n * p + q) r < -> is_gcd p q r
odd_even_lem : forall p q : nat, 2 * p + 1 <> 2 * q
mult_acc = fix mult_acc (s m n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => s | S p => mult_acc (tail_plus m s) m p end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments mult_acc (_ _ _)%nat_scope
is_lcm_sym : forall p q r : nat, is_lcm p q r -> is_lcm q p r
is_lcm_fun : forall p q r1 r2 : nat, is_lcm p q r1 -> is_lcm p q r2 -> r1 = r2
is_gcd_plus : forall p q r : nat, is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q + p) r
Nat.log2_up = fun a : nat => match 1 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.log2 (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.log2_up _%nat_scope
is_rel_prime_div : forall p q k : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> p div q * k -> p div k
is_rel_prime_div_r : forall p q k : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> p div k * q -> p div k
is_gcd_moduplus : forall p q k r : nat, p div k -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q + k) r
O_or_S : forall n : nat, {m : nat | S m = n} + {0 = n}
is_gcd_div : forall p q : nat, p div q -> is_gcd p q p
is_gcd_fun : forall p q r1 r2 : nat, is_gcd p q r1 -> is_gcd p q r2 -> r1 = r2
is_gcd_sym : forall p q r : nat, is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd q p r
cmp_sub : forall x y : nat, {z : nat | z + y = x} + {x < y}
Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := Nat.divmod x y q u in x + S y * q + (y - u) = S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
divides_mult : forall p q k : nat, p div q -> p div k * q

``` 
- specialize (bezout_generalized_lt p q).
  destruct (bezout_generalized_lt p q).
  destruct x as [a [b [g [l [u [v [eq1 [gcd [lcm [up [vpg [alev bpg]]]]]]]]]]]].
  exists a, b, g, l.
  split.
  + subst. rewrite Nat.mul_comm. exact eq1.
  + split.
    * exact gcd.
    * split.
      -- exact lcm.
      -- exists u, v. auto.
```

original: - specialize (bezout_generalized_lt p q). destruct (bezout_generalized_lt p q). destruct x as [a [b [g [l [u [v [eq1 [gcd [lcm [up [vpg [alev bpg]]]]]]]]]]]]. exists a, b, g, l. split. + subst. rewrite Nat.mul_comm. apply eq1. + split. * apply gcd. * split. -- apply lcm. -- exists u, v. auto.
